ProductInfo.Features:
MTECH new 7 inch 2-in-1 2-in-1 PHONE + TABLET = PHABLET. Support Dual SIM Card.
Dual Core CPU 1GHZ * 2 runs Android 4.0 more stable and smooth.
2G GSM 50/900/1800/1900 and 3G WCDMA2100/850/1900 Android Smartphone; Supports Dual SIM card, compatible with T-Mobile and AT&T;
Build-in 3G, Bluetooth and Wifi 802.11 b/g/n compatible keeps you connected anywhere you go.
Dual Camera: Rear Camera 2.0 Mega Pixel. Front Camera 0.3 mega pixel
ProductInfo.Name: MTECH MTP211 7" 2G GSM & 3G Dual SIM Card and Dual Core Bluetooth Android 4.0 High Definition Capacitive Touchscreen Tablet Smartphone Unlocked / Dual CPU 1GHZ * 2 / 512MB DDR / 4G Flash / Dual Camera (Silver)
